Package gw.api.database.upgrade.before

Interface IBeforeUpgradeUpdateBuilder

All Superinterfaces:
IBeforeUpgradeJoinableRestriction, IBeforeUpgradeQueryableTable, IBeforeUpgradeRestriction
public interface IBeforeUpgradeUpdateBuilder extends IBeforeUpgradeQueryableTable
Updates rows in the database for the given table.

    • withParallelDml

      IBeforeUpgradeUpdateBuilder withParallelDml(boolean useParallelDml)
      Use parallel DML when executing this statement (Oracle only). This behavior may be turned off globally in the configuration by setting the ora-parallel-dml attribute on the upgrade element to "disable". It may also be overridden with the parallel-dml attribute of the versiontrigger element.
      Parameters:
      useParallelDml - @return this

    • execute

      int execute()
      Executes the query. If already in a transaction, the query executes in that transaction; otherwise a new transaction is created and committed when the method returns, or rolled back if the method throws an exception.
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected
